PROJECT DONE
1. DEFENCE SECURWARE ( FRONT END:ASP.Net, BACK END: SQL SERVER 
2008 )
DESCRIPTION: It is an online system which users can exchange the important files 
in secured way. This application is only for army personnel

2. PLACEMENT AUTOMATION (FRONT END:PHP, BACK END: MySQL)
DESCRIPTION: This is an application that provides functions for both job seekers 
and employees. It can provide an electronic version of the traditional job searching, 
which can used by both non employers looking for an entry level job and employed 
persons looking for a better job 
3. ONLINE COLLEGE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (FRONT END:PHP , BACK 
END: MySQL)
DESCRIPTION: This System is useful for the students, staff, parents who like to 
display Result as well as attendance and all the task like event, news, fresh assignment
without going to college.
